alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 18 at 11:38AM PST until November 21 at 2:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 65 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northeast to east winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 2 AM to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Monday afternoon through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Wind Advisory, strongest northwest winds from the ridge lines to the desert slopes Sunday morning. Peak gusts could reach 70 mph on the slopes of Mt. San Jacinto. For the High Wind Watch, strongest northeast to east winds with gusts to 70 mph, along the coastal slopes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
